name: telegram-plugin
description: Remote interaction with Claude Code via Telegram - receive task updates, approval requests, and control sessions from your phone
longDescription: Control and monitor Claude Code remotely via Telegram. Receive smart notifications about task completions, errors, session events, and important insights. Respond to Claude's questions via Telegram inline keyboards. Stay connected to your development workflow from anywhere.

features.description: Get notified about task completions, errors, session events, and important insights

features.title: Keyword Detection
features.description: Automatically detect suggestions, clarifications, and discoveries in Claude's responses

features.title: Batched Messages
features.description: Reduce notification noise with intelligent message batching

features.title: Fully Configurable
features.description: Customize notifications, timeouts, and logging preferences to your workflow
